title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Here is the beginnings of the proof for the real reason why government is pushing the Covid vaxx. The video starts out rather laid back. Keep watching. It's 21-minutes worth it.Off-Grid Engineer's Very Real Findings in the "Schmax," Plus a House Tour / Ep 20Quote from: https://rumble.com/v1q5to5-off-grid-engineers-very-real-findings-in-the-schmax-plus-a-house-tour-ep-20.html?fbclid=IwAR3Dtfn_HMBxUsvZTNTtoZmt8C9NFXkmUN7NxvsSW4ge9VysLu40I5JHCAMThis video was deleted on Youtube, and since it was originally made for YT some of the words were altered with hopes to bypass censorship.Mat was on the *Stu* Peters show for what he found when he connected electric current to his LIVE Blood that was mixed with THE vaccine.He found when the current is connected, that what appears to be a circuit board starts to form, and when the current goes away, they disassemble. This has been confirmed by other professionals who can confirm that it is FACT.(And Correction: Electric Current was from ethernet, not wifi.)You'll see a mix of Good and Evil as there's also an inspiring Off-Grid House Tour.This awakening can't be all bad....
